article_title: Writer learning about lives and loves of Ron and Carol Cope for book

article_metadata.description: KEARNEY — Ever since tulips bloomed last spring, Todd von Kampen has been opening old boxes and digging into yellowed invitations and mementos, faded Kearney Hub clippings and the love letters Ron Cope wrote to Carol during their eight-year courtship.
